text: The St. Thomas Church () is a Lutheran church in Leipzig. Many famous composers visited or worked here. Johann Sebastian Bach was the Kantor of the church from 1723 until his death in 1750. He is buried in the church. ==Other websites== * Official parish page * Entry in the "Leipzig encyclopedia" Category:12th-century buildings and structures Category:Protestant churches in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in Leipzig
title: St. Thomas Church, Leipzig
